body: Thought I'd share the good news, I've commissioned this since I got the first 3 chapters translated, thought I'd get this one done too.
Gotta say I like this artist and hope this series gets picked up like the Nandemo one did
@zerobero12 you dont like it yet you keep coming back, if it annoys you then it's your fault for seeking it out every time dont be a whinny bitch over drawing
@zerobero12 you seriously won't do shit stop.

story is trash,again,my rate,👎0/50,can someone give me a link to his discord,or patreon or something..id like to meet him since im in japan right now..lets give this guy an advice or lesson..please dont be a coward like Shindol and Mizuryu Kei,
In just sad only the first of these is translated, they just keep doing the random one shots
This wasn't expected this soon, at least imo.
